cont.entity_a: Not durable, with big holes appearing at the fingertips after light use. Stitching becomes loose after a few uses. Material change makes them more cheaply made, but price remains the same. Generally wear out after 9 months to a year of steady use. Not recommended for professional daily use due to lack of durability.
cont.entity_b: Deformed fingers and loose threads indicate poor quality. Quality has decreased over time with faster wear. Durability is inconsistent, with some pairs wearing out quickly.

cont.entity_a: Material at the fingertips is like spandex, contributing to wear.
cont.entity_b: Palm material is thin and fragile.

Design.comm: Fit is generally good but sizing can vary.

cont.entity_a: Design is thicker in many parts, negating high dexterity. Fit well and are comfortable for all-day wear. Good fit, comfortable, and protective for light to moderate material handling. Easy to put on and off, true to size, but not suitable for abrasive surfaces. Fit is generally true to size, but sizing can vary between purchases.
cont.entity_b: Comfortable, breathable, and provide stable grip. Fit is snug and provides sufficient feel for precision tasks. Logo tags are stitched through seams, potentially affecting comfort. Comfortable, with good tactile feel and fit.

cont.entity_a: Excellent dexterity and touch screen performance. Touch screen feature suffers after use in dirtier environments. Touch screen capability requires using more of the finger pad than the tip. Work well with phone screens but wear quickly with heavy work.
Suitable for light duty work like raking and mowing. Not suitable for daily construction work. Good for general homeowner projects and maintenance.
cont.entity_b: Not suitable for heavy-duty tasks. Suitable for light protection, not for inclement weather. Recommended for dry, light duty work. Good for shooting and handling firearms. Not recommended for cold or wet conditions. Great for general work, but not for heavy-duty tasks.

cont.entity_a: Good grip without being overly bulky.
Price remains the same despite material change.

cont.entity_b: Velcro wrist closure wears out quickly.
